## ImageGenerationRequest.guidanceScale property

Controls the strength of the prompt. Suggested values are: \* 0-9 (low strength) \* 10-20 (medium strength) \* 21+ (high strength)

**Signature:**

```typescript
guidanceScale?: number;
```
